title: Moroccan plaited loaf with a bessara dip
description: A ring of plaited bread filled with olives, goats' cheese and harissa. Bessara is a Moroccan dip similar to hummus.
ingredients: 800g/1lb 12oz very strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
3 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for greasing
1 free-range egg, beaten with a splash of milk for egg wash
